title: Smart Data models - I40SmOEE schema
description: I40 Submodel which integrates the necessary attributes to calculate and share the OEE of an I40 asset

oee.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Result of the last OEE calculation

availability.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Result of the last Availability calculation

performance.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Result of the last Performance calculation

quality.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Result of the last Performance calculation

maximumDuration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Size of a continuous time window which defines the maximum duration used in OEE calculations. It includes both, productive and non-productive periods of the selected time window. It is expressed according to the ISO_8601 model for durations https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations.

idealProductionDuration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Amount of time for which an ideal asset would be available within the time window selected for the OEE calculation. It is expressed according to the ISO_8601 model for durations https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations.

idealCycleDuration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Duration of a good production cycle executed with ideal performance

idealGoodCycleCount.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. (idealProductionDuration/idealCycleDuration) Maximum amount of cycles for which an ideal asset would be available within the time window selected for the OEE session.

idealAvailabilityRatio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. A number between '0' and '1' 'idealAssetAvailability/maximumDuration'.

actualAvailabilityDuration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual amount of time for which the real asset was available within the time window selected for the OEE calculation. It is expressed according to the ISO_8601 model for durations https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations.

actualGoodCycleCount.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Actual amount of cycles in which the asset has performed well.

actualCycleCount.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Actual amount of cycles which includes all the cycles started by the asset (good and bad cycles).
